title: Celebrate the Beautiful Game with the Beautiful Set

replies.body: I think Lee Sin would be a great striker. That kick doesn't lie
Cmon hes blind what could he do?
He could be a ref...
WHAT DO YOU MEAN THE REF DIDN'T SEE THAT FOUL??????
OOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHH! NO ONES EVER DONE THAT!
in the history of do- league of legends!

YES. Put him in full ref uniform with a {{item:3140}} over his eyes. You know, like every ref. His first q is a soccer ball, but for the followup dash-q, he would sprint towards the target quickly blowing on his whistle in sharp short bursts (this would transition very well into his e btw). His w would be the same as it is now except it would have an animation where he gives the signal for advantage holding both arms out as he dashes towards his teammate. His first e would be he blows his whistle really loudly and for the second part he raises his arm, and pulls out a yellow card for a slow. And for his ult, he raises his hand for a red card, then before he actually kicks the crap out of the target like normal, he winds up but doesnt actually ever throw the kick because before he does his victims flops backwards, flying through the air overreacting as they throw their hands up covering their face and scream before landing on the ground. Just like real soccer! :D
HES BLIND
ALL THE REFS ARE BLIND!!!
Striker Lee Sin would be great. How about a bicycle kick for his ult! Riot please.
There should also be a soccer ball rammus skin too!
